mapper.insert: insert into customer (cusid, cstore, cname, ctel, cidcardno, csex, cbirth, clinkman, custype, cuslevel, cbankaccount, clasttime, ccarnum, cadress, cadvisor, cremark, cregtime, cstatus ) values (#{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cstore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cidcardno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbirth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{clinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuslevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clasttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ccarnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cadvisor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cregtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update customer set cstore = #{cstore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=CHAR}, ctel = #{ctel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cidcardno = #{cidcardno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, csex = #{csex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cbirth = #{cbirth,jdbcType=DATE}, clinkman = #{clinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custype = #{custype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cuslevel = #{cuslevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cbankaccount = #{cbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clasttime = #{clasttime,jdbcType=DATE}, ccarnum = #{ccarnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cadress = #{cadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cadvisor = #{cadvisor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cremark = #{cremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cregtime = #{cregtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cstatus = #{cstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where cusid = #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cusid, cstore, cname, ctel, cidcardno, csex, cbirth, clinkman, custype, cuslevel, cbankaccount, clasttime, ccarnum, cadress, cadvisor, cremark, cregtime, cstatus from customer where cusid = #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select cusid, cstore, cname, ctel, cidcardno, csex, cbirth, clinkman, custype, cuslevel, cbankaccount, clasttime, ccarnum, cadress, cadvisor, cremark, cregtime, cstatus from customer
